alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:53PM CDT until August 08 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Newton County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sarcoxie, or 7 miles southeast of Carthage, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Neosho... Granby... Sarcoxie... Diamond... Fidelity... Reeds... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 20 and 28. Interstate 49 near mile marker 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
